item.title: Macy’s Stock Rockets 21% Today – CEO Says Consumer Sentiment Has Remained Strong So Far, But Warns Of Selective Spending Ahead
item.description: Macy’s now expects fiscal 2025 net sales of $21.15 billion to $21.45 billion, compared with the previous forecast of $21.0 billion to $21.4 billion.
